Add WikiMatch MVP - Vanilla JS Wikidata Reconciliation Tool

Implemented complete single-page application for Wikidata entity reconciliation:

Features:
- File upload with drag & drop (CSV/TSV/TXT support)
- Wikidata Reconciliation API integration with rate limiting
- Entity type filtering (Person, Organization, Place)
- Auto-matching for high-confidence results (â‰¥95%)
- Manual review interface with candidate cards
- CSV export with Wikidata IDs and metadata
- Built-in console logging and unit tests

Tech Stack:
- Vanilla JavaScript (zero framework dependencies)
- Tailwind CSS (CDN)
- PapaParse for CSV parsing
- Form-encoded API requests (fixed from JSON)

Test Data:
- People, places, concepts, organizations
- Multiple formats (CSV, TSV, semicolon-delimited)

Documentation:
- Usage guide with workflow examples
- Comprehensive test checklist
